Shrining Some Monsters (Spoiler Alert! It's HUGE!)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Monster Farm 4 (Spoilers!): Reviews, Information on Gameplay, Etc. : Shrining Some Monsters (Spoiler Alert! It's HUGE!)
By Lisa Shock on Friday, August 22, 2003 - 09:52 am:

I shrined some discs last night, and here are some results. (I won't post the names of my region 1 DVDs since most MF4 players aren't in the US and don't have access to them.)

MF3 locked
MF2 locked
MFBCepII locked
(I don't own MF HAB)
Pandora Disc Zumm/Zuum
*Sweet Velvet, Flame of Love Ogyo/Madillo
*Coupling With Elephant Baku/Baku
Garu/Ripper (looks like a Gremlin from the film)
Hare/Raiden (very natty, has tiny wings)
Joker/Joker (the cape has very fine tatters at the end, like hair animation)
Madillo/Madillo
Madillo/Beaclon
Psiroller/Psiroller (it's a plushie now! even sleeps on its pillowy wheel)
Ripper/Durahan
Suezo/Hare
Suezo/Tiger
Tiger/Zuum (called Daton Rex, doesn't look like a triceratops)
and....drum roll...
MF1 makes a rare that is a DINO! It's called Dino and looks like it, with a more subdued, darker color scheme!

That's what I have seen so far. I will most more types as I see them.

*These are Japanese mini-CD singles of songs from the MF anime series.

By Lisa Shock on Friday, August 22, 2003 - 03:49 pm:

It's a Zuum rare, Zuum/?, so it's really just a Zuum sub-type, but they took the time to make it look like a 3D rendered version of the MR1 Dino. It has the smooth/rounded (no spikes or frills) head, the darker scales on the top of the head/neck/back/tail, the larger/heavier body of a Dino. I know it's not as exciting as having a whole main breed of Dinos, but I hope it pleases some fans.

BTW, I suggested this monster (a Dino as a Zuum rare) to Tecmo Japan directly in a teleconference call in late 2001. It was right around the time that MR1 was about to have its 5th anniversary, and I pointed out that fans who played the original deserved to get something extra for sticking with the series for so long.

By Lisa Shock on Friday, August 22, 2003 - 06:19 pm:

Yeah, so far I the only monster I have found twice is pure Joker.
Today I shrined:
Suezo/Zan
Suezo/Hare
Mogi/Suzurin (a girl dog with brown hair and a flower on top of the cap)
Plant/CP (odd)
Hare/CP (odd, just odd)
Garu/Naga (very dark and cool looking)
Beaclon/Ducken

The Beaclon/Ducken is pretty wild. It's still an incredibly weird monster, for those who have played MR2. But, this time, in addition to having the wind-up key on its back, it has a clear cover over the back which lets you sort of see a bunch of gears working inside. Very detailed animation on this one.

So far, CP subs are the oddest/dumbest looking monsters....

By Shankdaddy on Saturday, August 23, 2003 - 08:49 pm:

I just got the game yesterday. Here are some of the monsters I've shrined so far. If you want pictures of any of them, or to know what CD I used to get them for those of you that have MF4, let me know.


MONSTER FARM 4 Monster LIST

Zuum/Baku Looks just like Hachiro

Zuum/Gitan A purple Zuum with dark eyes and spikes on it's tail.

Tiger/Not sure... Looks really evil. Half of it's body is grey the other half red and black. Has very evil face and long twisted horns.

Tiger/Zan Very cool looking. Black with red eyes, looks armored and has blades on all his feet and tail.

Hare/Golem A Hare made of rock with yellow eyes.

Hare/Pancho A Hare in a green suit wearing a pumkin on his face and waste....

Dragon/Naga Purple Dragon with a Naga face and chest. Pretty cool looking.

Dukken/Pancho Dukken made of pumkins... go figure.

Durahan/Suzurin Very ugly Durahan with pink/white armor. Has gold helm, shield, hands and feet.

Naga/Ripper My first monster to raise, cause he's just that cool looking. White and purple with black face and belly. Also has spikes. Very cool.

Antlan/Pixie Pink Antlan with white trim. Heart designs.

Antlan/Zan Black Antlan with red trim. Red eyes and big evil grin.

Garu/Mocchi Pink Garu with green hair and chest/back.

Madillo/Ripper White Madillo with purple spikes.

Madillo/Mocchi Pink Madillo with Green armor.

Ripper/Hare Brown Ripper with fur and long ears.

Ripper/Lesione A blue Ripper with a Lesione head.

Golem/CP A big green Golem made of CPs...

Zuum/Dragon Just like the pictures.

Plant/Pixi Just like you think it would look.

Jell/Plant A Jell that's green and red colored.

Garu/Tiger A Garu that's blue and white and has horns.

Golem/Raiden White and black Golem with gold face and shoulders and feather-like spikes on it's arms.

Lesione/Henger A Lesione that's made of Henger parts.

Tiger/Henger Tiger made of Henger parts.

Golem/Gitan Purple Golem with Fang designs.

Suezo/Pixie Pinkeye

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, August 23, 2003 - 11:03 pm:

I just shrined some more tonight. The most notable being:
*Mew/Baku: looks like Lambchop, very cute

Zuum/Psiroller: psiroller colored with a few stripes, some make a necktie, it has a tricertops beak-type mouth, a two horns on its nose (one big and a tiny one behind it), and a three-horned frill at the back of its head. It's a cool fantasy dinosaur!

Naga/Plant: Head like a Venus Flytrap, including the flat mouth and tentacle teeth. No eyes. Yes, no eyes. Has a flowery ruffle at the base of the neck, some small spikes on the tail, and a mostly green color scheme. This is one of the weirdest monsters I have ever seen.

Jell/Joker: It's just grey wisps like smoke, as if all that existed were the thin strips of color on a normal jell. It has the ball heart. In view mode, when you make it run, it makes itself into a figure like a chicken with bicycle wheels. An homage to the Doodle perhaps....

I'll post a longer list of everything I have so far, tomorrow.

*ok, ok, it's Nya in Japanese....
